pkgmetadata.longdescription: Rmetrics - Modeling of Multivariate Financial Return Distributions // A collection of functions inspired by Venables and Ripley (2002) doi:10.1007/978-0-387-21706-2 and Azzalini and Capitanio (1999) arXiv:0911.2093 to manage, investigate and analyze bivariate and multivariate data sets of financial returns.
